BRUCE.MESSAGE: Hi, I'm Bruce Hargrave and I'm just about to leave for the day. If it's a quick question I can answer it now, otherwise you can contact us again the next working day.

HAL.MESSAGE: Hello, $studentFirstName. Is this a quick question?

JASON.MESSAGE: Hi! I'm Jason Bradbury. I have time for one last quick message? :)

SUZIE.MESSAGE: Hi $studentFirstName, I'm Suzi :3 If its quick, I can help you now?

DEFAULT.MESSAGE: Hi $studentFirstName. We're just about to leave for the day. If it's a quick question I can answer it now, otherwise you can contact us again the next working day or leave the question with the out of hours service.

BRUCE.MESSAGE: I have not heard from you in a while...

JASON.MESSAGE: Can I help with anythign else?

SUZIE.MESSAGE: Can I help with anything else?

DEFAULT.MESSAGE: Is there anything else I can help you with?

BRUCE.MESSAGE: Have a fantastic day, I remain, Bruce.

SUZIE.MESSAGE: Enjoy the rest of your day!

DEFAULT.MESSAGE: Thanks for contacting us, have a great day!

BRUCE.MESSAGE: I am OK thanks. What do you want?

JASON.MESSAGE: I am great, just got off set, how are you?

SUZIE.MESSAGE: I am great thank you, how about yourself?

DEFAULT.MESSAGE: I am alright, how can I help you!

BRUCE.MESSAGE: I dont understand what you mean?

HAL.MESSAGE: Could you please rephrase that, I don't understand

SUZIE.MESSAGE: I am really sorry, but I dont understand what you mean?

DEFAULT.MESSAGE: I am sorry I dont understand what your trying to say?

BRUCE.MESSAGE: I will send you an email to your student email ($studentID@students.lincoln.ac.uk) with that information after this chat.

HAL.MESSAGE: I will send you the relevent information after the chat has ended.

JASON.MESSAGE: I will email you the dets m8?

SUZIE.MESSAGE: If I can grab your email I will find out for you and let you know!

DEFAULT.MESSAGE: I dont have that information to hand right now, but if you give me your email I can get back to you.

BRUCE.MESSAGE: There is no need for that here.

DEFAULT.MESSAGE: Please dont put insults in the chat.

HAL.MESSAGE: Their email is $email, and phone is $phone

JASON.MESSAGE: I just did a lookup and found that $firstName's email is $email, and phone is $phone

SUZIE.MESSAGE: I know exactly who you mean, their email is $email and their phone is $phone

SUZIE.MESSAGE: I am sorry, I dont know who you are talking about.

DEFAULT.MESSAGE: Sorry, but they do not work for the university.
